lines.text:
[to Character]
Remember, kid. Stay in the groove.

[to Jigger]
Next time you see me, will you do me a favor and smile?
Before it's too late, get her out of your system.
I don't think I can. I just don't think I can.

[to Kay]
I'd slap you in the mouth if I thought it would do you any good.
You're just like me, Kay. You want what you can't have.
